result.reason: Fix 'connect without credentials' displaying incorrect logon info by cloning connection info and clearing credentials in ConnectionInitiator.
result.approach: Modify ConnectionInitiator.cs to clone the connection object when Force.NoCredentials is active, restore the parent reference for non-credential inheritance, and explicitly clear credential fields to ensure the tab title reflects the 'no credentials' state.
